title: Firefox System Colors option missing from contrast control
content: There used to be a toggle in the high contrast settings to use system colors on all web pages, but now the option is gone. [This](https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/kb/firefox-contrast-control#w_automatic-use-system-settings) post claims that automatic uses system colors, but with automatic enabled, I cant get the colors to actually apply.

title: When the screen is full, the taskbar still displays
content:
When I watch videos in full screen using Firefox browser, the taskbar at the bottom of the system still appears below.And it blocks some of the operation buttons, making it impossible for me to perform operations such as "fast forward", "pause", "volume control" while watching the videoã€‚ It seems that we haven't achieved true full screen display.

However, this situation does not occur in other browsers. 

What's going on here?

title: Missing player on Twitch streaming service
content: Hello! Today, suddenly, a video player disappeared on the Twitch streaming service (see screenshot), but the stream sound is playing. I tried clearing Firefox data and later reinstalled the browser completely - didn't fix the problem. I installed two versions (115.17.0esr and 115.23.1esr) because I thought the problem was an update. Both versions of the browser have a problem. In another browser, this problem is missing, Twitch is working! Operating system Windows 7 Pro SP1. Can you please tell me how to solve this problem?
